data.title: Aluda Ketelauri
data.meta_description: Aluda Ketelauri: Directed by Giorgi Gagloshvili. With Iorek Chitashvili, Sandro Kakhetelidze. The Animation is based on Vazha-Pshavela's poem "Aluda Ketelauri" In the village "Shatili" Located in Khevsureti, Two Kists steal cattle. they are chased and killed by an esteemed Khevsurian man, named Aluda Ketelauri. A Khevsurian tradition says, that after killing the enemy, their right hand must be cut off. Something changes within Aluda and he decides to honor his enemy by not cutting his hand off. He returns to the village, announcing that he didn't uphold the tradition. Khevsurs are enraged, which changes Aluda's life drastically.
